name: Curve The Bullet
description:
Ever heard the myth about being able to curve a bullet by the shooter swinging or flicking their arm? Well now you can. This playable prototype contains a few levels to test out this mechanic

How to run
  1. Download The files
  2. unzip CurveTheBullet
  3. run CurveTheBullet.exe

Soundtrack available:
https://soundcloud.com/joseph-mills-538028114/pseudoscience
